definition: to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: So close, that when you close your eyes, I fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 如此靠近，当你闭上你的双眼，我沉沉入睡。

sentences.english: With the eyes nine-tenths closed, focus at the tip of your nose.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛闭上十分之九，注意力集中在鼻尖。

sentences.english: So I just shut my mouth and waited.
sentences.chinese: 所以我就闭上我的嘴巴，静静的等待。

sentences.english: His breathing slowed and he closed his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 索皮的呼吸变得缓慢了，它闭上了眼睛。

sentences.english: I haven't told anyone, so keep your mouth shut.
sentences.chinese: 我没有告诉任何人，所以闭上你的嘴。

sentences.english: When we start to play this game, please close your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 当我们开始做这个游戏时请闭上你们的眼睛。

sentences.english: Her eyes were vair, And never closed when I kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 在我吻她时，她从不闭上毛茸茸的双眼。
请把另一只眼睛也闭上。

sentences.english: I can't open my eyes to watch you jumping into the fiery pit, for I will shut my eyes at the time.
sentences.chinese: 我不会眼睁睁看着你往火坑里跳，到时候我会闭上的。

sentences.english: Close your eyes as you do this.
sentences.chinese: 这么做的时候，闭上你的眼睛。

sentences.english: If you want a new friend you should close one eye.
sentences.chinese: 如果想要交一个新朋友，则要闭上一只眼睛。

sentences.english: Closing your eyes and breathing into your belly, imagine roots growing from your feet deep into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 闭上双眼，气沉丹田，想象双足深深扎根于大地。

sentences.english: Now then - hold out your hands and close your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 喏，伸出你的手，闭上你的眼睛。

sentences.english: Her body relaxed and her eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 她的身体松弛下来，闭上了双眼。

sentences.english: Close your eyes and for ten to fifteen minutes and practice deep, slow, and comfortable breathing into your lower abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 闭上双眼，从腹部由内而外慢慢深呼吸十至十五分钟。

definition: to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
to narrow one's eyes/to squint/(dialect) to take a nap
mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
to doze/to take a nap/nodding off to sleep
to relax with one's eyes closed
